issue.title: [Java] writeNull method in UnionListWriter doesn't work correctly if validity at that index is already set
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10779](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10779). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
UnionListWriter#writeNull writes a empty list instead of null if the validity bit at that index was not already unset
